trans-unit.source: Searches HTTP response text for return values for Web service clients.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务客户端中搜索有关返回值的 HTTP 响应文本。

trans-unit.source: The PatternMatcher class performs pattern matching using regular expressions to find Web method return values in text encoded in the body of an HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: PatternMatcher 类执行模式匹配正则表达式用于查找 Web 方法返回值在编码的 HTTP 响应的正文中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The PatternMatcher class is called by the client-side <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.TextReturnReader> class, which deserializes Web service return values.
trans-unit.target: 由客户端调用 PatternMatcher 类<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.TextReturnReader>类，该类反序列化 Web 服务返回值。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.TextReturnReader>

trans-unit.source: Text pattern matching provides a way for Web services to retrieve HTML content without converting it to XML documents that must be bound to XML Schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: 文本模式匹配提供 Web 服务应检索 HTML 内容，而不将其转换为必须绑定到 XML 架构定义的 XML 文档的方法。

trans-unit.source: Regular expression search targets are specified in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document via `match` XML elements within `text` elements.
trans-unit.target: 在通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中未指定正则表达式搜索目标`match`中的 XML 元素`text`元素。

trans-unit.source: Both elements belong to the namespace http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/.
trans-unit.target: 这两个元素属于命名空间 http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/。

trans-unit.source: When `match` elements are specified in a WSDL document, the Wsdl.exe tool applies <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> attributes to the corresponding Web methods in the client proxy class that is generated.
trans-unit.target: 当`match`元素指定在 WSDL 文档，Wsdl.exe 工具将应用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>特性来生成客户端代理类中的相应 Web 方法。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> attribute's properties establish the search criteria for a PatternMatcher instance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>特性的属性建立 PatternMatcher 实例的搜索判据。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A developer typically does not need to directly use PatternMatcher.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员通常不必直接使用 PatternMatcher。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher"></xref> instance based on the input type.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher"></xref>实例根据输入类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher> instance's properties, such as the regular expression to make the search target, are populated based on <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> attributes applied to fields of the return type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>实例的属性，如正则表达式，以使搜索目标，都基于填充<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute>应用于字段的返回类型的属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MatchAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.PatternMatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that specifies the return type for a Web method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>，指定 Web 方法的返回类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Searches a text input to deserialize an object representing a Web method return value.
trans-unit.target: 搜索文本输入进行反序列化表示 Web 方法返回值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Match method's return value is the Web method return value deserialized from the input text.
trans-unit.target: 匹配方法的返回值是的 Web 方法返回输入文本中反序列化值。

trans-unit.source: The text to search, which is the body of the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本，这是 HTTP 响应的正文。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a Web method return value.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 方法的对象返回值。
